data.title: Russian Economy, The
data.meta_description: Although the Russian economy performed poorly in the first 7 years following the collapse of the USSR, the reforms of the 1990s laid the foundation for strong growth in 1998–2008. The early 2000s also saw successful reforms, such as the flat income tax and...
